title: Mobile-Based Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Elementary Mathematics Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computational skills and understanding of elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Blended education program for corporate managers/leaders aged 40+ to reinforce mobile device-based math concept review and practical application competencies in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners will accurately understand core concepts of elementary mathematics (fractions, decimals, ratios, etc.) with over 90% accuracy through mobile learning materials.
Learners demonstrate concept application skills by achieving an average score of 80 or higher on mobile quiz systems in a blended environment.
By the end of the course, learners will be able to apply at least three real-world problem-solving cases provided by the mobile platform to practical scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
